mapper.select: -- 总数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM boki_post boki_reply boki_storey_reply b WHERE b.report_status = 2 AND b.is_deleted = 'n'; -- id ，用户id，用户名，标题或内容，理由，修改时间 SELECT b.id,b.user_id,bu.user_name,b.report_reason,b.modified_time AS report_time, b.title AS content b.content FROM boki_post boki_reply boki_storey_reply b JOIN boki_user bu ON b.user_id = bu.id WHERE b.report_status = 2 AND b.is_deleted = 'n' ORDER BY b.modified_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{end};
mapper.update: -- 驳回举报 UPDATE boki_post boki_reply boki_storey_reply SET report_status = 1,report_reason = NULL WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: -- 帖子总数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM boki_post WHERE is_deleted = 'n' AND type_id = 2; -- 首页帖子列表 SELECT bp.id,bp.title,bp.content,bp.create_time,bp.modified_time,bp.user_id,bp.replies_count,bp.type_id,bp.is_top, bu1.user_name,bu1.credit_degree, bu2.user_name AS last_replier FROM boki_post bp JOIN boki_user bu1 ON bp.user_id = bu1.id JOIN boki_user bu2 ON bp.last_replier_id = bu2.id WHERE bp.is_deleted = 'n' AND type_id = 2 ORDER BY bp.is_top DESC, bp.create_time DESC LIMIT #{start},#{end};

-- 帖子基本信息 SELECT id,user_id,title,replies_count,type_id FROM boki_post WHERE id = #{postId}; -- 楼层总数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS totalCount FROM boki_reply br JOIN boki_user bu ON br.user_id = bu.id WHERE br.post_id = #{postId}; -- 楼层列表 SELECT br.id, br.user_id,br.post_id,br.floor_no,br.create_time,br.content,br.replies_count, bu.user_name,bu.photo,bu.exp,bu.credit_degree,bu.role_id FROM boki_reply br JOIN boki_user bu ON br.user_id = bu.id WHERE br.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY br.floor_no LIMIT #{start},#{end};

SELECT bsr.id, bsr.storey_id, bsr.user_id, bu1.user_name, -- bsr.to_user_id, -- bu2.user_name AS to_user_name, bsr.content, bsr.create_time FROM boki_storey_reply bsr JOIN boki_user bu1 ON bsr.user_id = bu1.id -- JOIN boki_user bu2 ON bsr.user_id = bu2.id WHERE bsr.storey_id = #{replyId} LIMIT #{start},#{end}
mapper.update: -- 更新帖子类型 UPDATE boki_post SET type_id = #{typeId},`modifier` = #{uId} WHERE id = #{postId};
-- 更新置顶与结束时间 UPDATE boki_post SET is_top = 'y',top_until = #{topUntil},`modifier`= #{uId} WHERE id = #{postId};
-- 取消置顶 UPDATE boki_post SET is_top = 'n',top_until = NULL,`modifier`= #{modifier} WHERE id = #{postId};
